section1.title: 1. General Information and Mandatory Notices
section1.content: Protecting your personal data is important to us. We treat your personal information confidentially and in accordance with legal data protection regulations as well as this privacy policy. This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and what rights you have regarding your data.

section2.title: 2. Responsible Party for Data Processing
section2.content: The responsible party for data processing within this web app is: [Operator's Name] [Address] [Email Address] [Phone Number]

section3.title: 3. Collection and Storage of Personal Data
section3.subtitle1: a) When Visiting Our Web App
section3.content1: When you access our web app, certain data is automatically collected by our server, such as: IP address, Date and time of access, Browser and operating system used, Pages visited and actions within the web app. This data is used exclusively to ensure smooth operation and improve our web app, and is automatically deleted afterward.
section3.subtitle2: b) Registration and Login for Using the Web App
section3.content2: To use the web app as a group, registration with a group account is required. During registration and login, we store: Group login data (username and password), User profiles within the group (name, possibly email address), Wishlists and assigned gift wishes with links to products

section4.title: 4. Use of Data for Wishlist Management
section4.content: Within the group, products can be saved as gift wishes and assigned to specific users. The product links and assignments are stored in our database and are only accessible to members of the respective group.

section5.title: 5. Premium Model and Payment Data
section5.content: If you choose our premium model, additional information necessary for payment processing will be stored. This includes: Payment methods, Transaction data, Payment status. Payment data is used exclusively for processing the premium membership and is securely stored in our database.

section6.title: 6. Data Sharing and Transfer
section6.content: We only share your personal data if it is necessary for fulfilling our service or if we are legally required to do so. No data is transferred to third parties without your explicit consent.

section7.title: 7. Data Retention and Deletion
section7.content: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy or as legally required. Data is typically deleted after the end of the contractual relationship and upon completion of statutory retention periods.

section8.title: 8. Your Rights
section8.content: You have the right at any time to: Request information about the data we have stored about you, Request correction of incorrect data, Request restriction of processing, Request deletion of your data, as permitted by law, Object to the processing of your data. To exercise your rights or if you have any further questions regarding the processing of your personal data, please contact us at: [Contact Email Address].

section9.title: 9. Data Security
section9.content: We employ appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or manipulation. Our security measures are continuously improved in line with technological advancements.

section10.title: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section10.content: We reserve the right to amend this privacy policy to comply with changes in legal requirements or in the functionality of our web app. The current version of the privacy policy is available on our web app at any time.

section1.title: 1. Scope
section1.content: These Terms and Conditions apply to the use of the GiftHub web app, a platform for organizing gifts within groups and families.

section2.title: 2. Service Description
section2.content: GiftHub enables users to organize gift wishes, create wishlists, and keep track of planned gifts. The app serves to coordinate gifts within groups while maintaining the element of surprise.

section3.title: 3. Registration and User Account
section3.content: Using GiftHub requires creating a group account. Users are obligated to keep their access credentials confidential and protect them from third-party access.

section4.title: 4. Usage Rules
section4.content: Users agree to use the app only for its intended purpose and not to share any illegal or offensive content.

section5.title: 5. Privacy
section5.content: The protection of personal data is our highest priority. Details can be found in our Privacy Policy.

section6.title: 6. Disclaimer
section6.content: GiftHub does not guarantee constant availability of the app and is not liable for damages caused by slight negligence.
